type: 政府采购 政府采购合同
description: Harbor Dredging, Shippagan Wharf, Gloucester County
full_summary:
================

**Harbor Dredging Project at Shippagan Wharf**
--------------------------------------------

### Project Overview

The Government of Canada invites suppliers to submit tenders for the Harbor Dredging Project at Shippagan Wharf, located in Gloucester County, New Brunswick. This project involves the furnishing of all necessary resources, labor, equipment, and materials for Class "B" dredging at the specified site.

### Project Details

*   **Trade Agreement**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
*   **GSIN Code**: 5138A - Dredging
*   **Estimated Cost**: $100,001 - $500,000 (HST excluded)
*   **Security Requirements**: Standard bid and contract security for construction is required

### Tender Provisions

All interested suppliers may submit a bid. The selection criteria will be based on the lowest price. Any inquiries of a technical nature and all questions of a contractual nature must be submitted in writing to the Contractual Authority: Sonia Stockman.

### Tender Documents and Submission

Tender documents are available through the Government Electronic Tendering System (GETS). Addenda, when issued, will be available on GETS. Standard terms and conditions for this procurement are incorporated by reference and form part of the tender and contract documents.

### Language of Documents

Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada. The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

### Contact Information

Sonia Stockman
Contractual Authority
Phone: (506) 961-7412
Email: sonia.stockman@pwgsc.gc.ca

### Tender Closing Date

The tender closing date is September 22, 2022, at 13:00:00.

Please ensure that your submission is received on time, and all necessary precautions are taken to avoid any late submissions or mistakes in your tender documents.

By adhering to the above guidelines, you'll be able to improve the overall clarity, concision, and professionalism of the rewritten entry. It's now concise and easy to follow. Thank You!!!
